title: Mysterious Ambient Soundscapes
longDescription:
A Pack of Atmospheric Background Soundscapes!

Contains 25(+3) Ambient Soundtracks (~2 min. length each).

Over 58 min. of Audio.


>FULL PREVIEW<

>SHORT PREVIEW<


Mood: dark, fantasy, mysterious, magical, discovery, anxious, aggressive, calm, chaotic, melancholic, disturbing, dreamy, epic, ethereal, evil, scary, haunting, mystical, omnious, suspense, tension, horror, exploring etc...


=========================

⚠️YOUTUBE-SAFE MUSIC*⚠️

=========================

The music is cleared with YouTube and can be freely used without any concerns of copyright strikes, flags, or demonetization. This is essential if you expect players to showcase your game in videos or streams!

(i.e. you will never get a copyright claim and ALSO you are allowed to use the soundtracks wherever you want and as many times as you need)

It means Unlimited Royalty-Free license! Use the music over and over, in any of your project or productions, without any additional fees or royalties.


=====⚠️IMPORTANT INFORMATION⚠️=====

Although extremely rare, issues can occasionally occur with the next three soundtracks:

  1. Ancient Forest
  2. Ancient Tree
  3. Mysterious Alchemy Laboratory


They include a sections that have been incorrectly matched with a different, similar sounding, tracks, leading to a claim being automatically raised when it’s used on YouTube.

The most appropriate method for dealing with an incorrect claim is to file a dispute: you’ll be asked to select a reason for your dispute, simply select the option ‘I have a licence or permission from the proper rights holder to use this material’. In this case the proper rights holder is me, and your licence / permission is the EULA you received when purchasing from the Unity Asset Store, Unreal Marketplace or from me directly (it will take some time but anyway the claim will be removed from your video).


That's why three additional soundtracks were added (1.1 update).

Also I decided to keep all the soundtracks (as a bonus) for those who don't care about Content ID.


=================

PRODUCT SUPPORT

=================

in case you are experiencing any kind of issues while using my product, please feel free to contact me directly at any time so I can help you out as quick as possible.

⚠️If you need just the *wav files — contact me after purchase.⚠️


⭐IF YOU LIKE MY MUSIC and found it useful - PLEASE don't forget to RATE/REVIEW the product⭐

(*so you would get a discount for your next purchase within my store, just contact me via email).


===============================

MY YOUTUBE CHANNEL (BLACKMID)

ORDER CUSTOM MUSIC ON FIVERR

===============================
technicalDetails:
The bundle contains 28 Ambient Soundtracks (~2 min. length each)

The sound clips are NOT LOOPABLE, HOWEVER you can "fade-in" or "fade-out", "cut" or "glue" them wherever you need.

02. Ancient Forest

03. Ancient Ghosts

04. Ancient Ruins

05. Ancient Tree

27. The Dungeon

28. Unstable Dark Energy


Number of Audio Wavs: 28

Number of Audio Cues: 28

Sample rate / bit rate: *wav 16 bit; 1411 kb/s; 44,100 kHz

Does music loop: NO

Minutes of audio provided: 58

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
